Name: Pep Sash
LongDescription: Earns the Pokémon Exp. Points every time it takes damage. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Tyrogue.  You can get a Pep Sash at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: Tyro-Sweat, Tyro-Card, and Muscle Charm. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
